name: Livadia Palace
description: The Livadia Palace was the main venue for the Yalta Conference in February 1945, where Stalin, Roosevelt, and Churchill met to discuss post-World War II arrangements.

name: Vorontsov Palace
description: Winston Churchill and his delegation stayed at the Vorontsov Palace during the Yalta Conference.

name: Massandra Palace
description: Joseph Stalin and his delegation resided at the Massandra Palace during the conference.

name: Koreiz Palace (Yusupov Palace)
description: Franklin D. Roosevelt and his delegation stayed at the Koreiz Palace (Yusupov Palace) during the Yalta Conference.
